tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicVariations (
    variant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    position INT,
    ref_allele VARCHAR(1),
    alt_allele VARCHAR(1),
    zygosity VARCHAR(10),
    population_frequency FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE genomic_variations (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  variation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  start_position INT NOT NULL,
  end_position INT NOT NULL,
  nucleotide_change VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_variations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    variation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    gene_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    chromosome_number INT NOT NULL,
    position INT NOT NULL,
    variant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    genetic_variation_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (genetic_variation_id) REFERENCES genetic_variations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE diseases (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    disease_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT NOT NULL,
    affected_genes VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    diagnosis_age INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Variations ( 
  variation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  gene_name VARCHAR(255), 
  chromosome VARCHAR(10), 
  position INTEGER, 
  variation_type VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE Gene (gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 chromosome VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 start_position INT NOT NULL,
 end_position INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Variation (variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 gene_id INT NOT NULL,
 variation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 impact_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id));

CREATE TABLE Sample (sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT NOT NULL,
 sample_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 collection_date DATE NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id));

CREATE TABLE VariationData (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 variation_id INT NOT NULL,
 sample_id INT NOT NULL,
 zygosity VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 data_value VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (variation_id) REFERENCES Variation(variation_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES Sample(sample_id));

CREATE TABLE Patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 DOB DATE NOT NULL,
 gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL);
